h3cRCPMIB.name: h3cRCPMIB
h3cRCPMIB.contactinfo: Platform Team Huawei 3Com Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.huawei-3com.com Zip:100085
h3cRCPMIB.description: The MIB module is used for managing RCP protocol server.

h3cRCPServerEnableStatus.name: h3cRCPServerEnableStatus
h3cRCPServerEnableStatus.description: This attribute controls the system wide operation of RCP server. The value TRUE means that the RCP server is enabled. The value FALSE means that the RCP server is disabled.

h3cRCPConnTimeout.name: h3cRCPConnTimeout
h3cRCPConnTimeout.description: Specifies the maximum time in seconds that a RCP client connection is idle.

h3cRCPRuleTimeout.name: h3cRCPRuleTimeout
h3cRCPRuleTimeout.description: Specifies the time in seconds before a RCP rule is aged out. If its value is 0, it indicates RCP rule will not be aged out.

h3cRCPServerMaxConn.name: h3cRCPServerMaxConn
h3cRCPServerMaxConn.description: Specifies the maximum number of clients that permitted to connect with RCP server at the same time.

h3cRCPServerCurConn.name: h3cRCPServerCurConn
h3cRCPServerCurConn.description: The current actual number of clients that connecting with RCP server.

h3cRCPConnTimeoutMaxValue.name: h3cRCPConnTimeoutMaxValue
h3cRCPConnTimeoutMaxValue.description: Specifies the maximum value of h3cRCPConnTimeout.

h3cRCPRuleTimeoutMaxValue.name: h3cRCPRuleTimeoutMaxValue
h3cRCPRuleTimeoutMaxValue.description: Specifies the maximum value of h3cRCPRuleTimeout.

h3cRCPServerMaxConnMaxValue.name: h3cRCPServerMaxConnMaxValue
h3cRCPServerMaxConnMaxValue.description: Specifies the maximum value of h3cRCPServerMaxConn.

h3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMinValue.name: h3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMinValue
h3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMinValue.description: Specifies the minimum value of balance group identity.

h3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMaxValue.name: h3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMaxValue
h3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMaxValue.description: Specifies the maximum value of balance group identity.

h3cRCPTotalUsers.name: h3cRCPTotalUsers
h3cRCPTotalUsers.description: Specifies the total number of RCP user.

h3cRCPTotalClientIPs.name: h3cRCPTotalClientIPs
h3cRCPTotalClientIPs.description: Specifies the total number of RCP client IP.

h3cRCPUserPassword.name: h3cRCPUserPassword
h3cRCPUserPassword.description: The password of RCP user. It is invisible to users and displayed as '***'.

h3cRCPUserRedirectInterface.name: h3cRCPUserRedirectInterface
h3cRCPUserRedirectInterface.description: The redirect interface index of RCP user. The RCP rule assigned by the user can be associated with the redirect interface. If the redirect interface is invalid, its value is set to be 0.

h3cRCPUserRedirectBalanceGroup.name: h3cRCPUserRedirectBalanceGroup
h3cRCPUserRedirectBalanceGroup.description: The redirect balance group identity of RCP user. The RCP rule assigned by the user can be associated with the redirect balance group. If the balance group is invalid, its value is set to be 0.

h3cRCPUserRowStatus.name: h3cRCPUserRowStatus
h3cRCPUserRowStatus.description: This manages the creation and deletion of rows, and shows the current status of the indexed user name. This object has the following values. active(1) The indexed user name is configured on the device. notInService(2) Not Supported. notReady(3) Not Supported. createAndGo(4) Create a new user. createAndWait(5) Not Supported. destroy(6) Delete this entry. The associated entry can be modified when the value of h3cRCPUserRowStatus is active(1). When deleting an inexistence entry, return noError.

h3cRCPClientIPType.name: h3cRCPClientIPType
h3cRCPClientIPType.description: The IP address type (IPv4 or IPv6) of RCP client.

h3cRCPClientIP.name: h3cRCPClientIP
h3cRCPClientIP.description: The IP address of RCP client.

h3cRCPClientIPRowStatus.name: h3cRCPClientIPRowStatus
h3cRCPClientIPRowStatus.description: This manages the creation and deletion or rows, and shows the current status of the indexed client IP address. This object has the following values. active(1) The indexed client IP is configured on the device. notInService(2) Not Supported. notReady(3) Not Supported. createAndGo(4) Create a new client IP. createAndWait(5) Not Supported. destroy(6) Delete this entry. The associated entry can be modified when the value of h3cRCPClientIPRowStatus is active(1). When deleting an inexistence entry, return noError.

h3cRCPSessionClientIPType.name: h3cRCPSessionClientIPType
h3cRCPSessionClientIPType.description: The IP address type (IPv4 or IPv6) of RCP client.

h3cRCPSessionRunningStatus.name: h3cRCPSessionRunningStatus
h3cRCPSessionRunningStatus.description: RCP server running status. It is one of the following status: connected: The connection is established and the RCP client is waiting for authentication. operational: The RCP client is authenticated and the server is ready for rule configuration request.
